to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Ubuntu 704 and speech.
body:
Hello to all. Before vew time i downloaded the full desktop cd of ubuntu 704 version so that install it. I followed the instructions from the accessibility
home page for the speach so to install it . the cd boots but i have no any speach. Also is possible to have unattended instalation like the windows version?
Any help is wellcome
thanks
--Kostas--
